Author: Melusedek
Text: Would it be better to split the patty in half and add a bunch of veggies and salad? Kinda like a deconstructed burger, then save half for leftovers?

Author: FeatherWorld
Text: You will be ok. Even if you ate it all, there will be no major changes in the long run, only sodium bloat straight up. Are you able to eat some, like half?
